About Author : 
Austin Kwan is a SFU CMPT 276 student. 

How to play: 
A mysterious basket of apples is delivered to you for free; it contains a note explaining that there are apples with mines mixed in with the regular apples. Being  the smart and intelligent person that you are, you decide to find all the apples with  mines with your latest and greatest scanner using the least number of scans. Scanning a regular apple reveals the number of mine apples in the same row and column. 
Scanning an apple that has a mine reveals that it is indeed a mine apple.
